util

Class CalendarUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.CalendarUtility

  • public class CalendarUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides static methods to compare dates.
    It fixes the default behavior of Date.before(java.util.Date) which returns true if applied to the same date
